name: Schwab U.S. Dividend Equity ETF
description: SCHD tracks a portfolio of U.S. companies with a record of paying and growing dividends, balancing quality screens with dependable income.

name: Realty Income Corporation
description: Realty Income is known as The Monthly Dividend Company, owning a diversified portfolio of retail and industrial properties leased on long-term agreements.

name: The Coca-Cola Company
description: Coca-Cola is a blue-chip beverage leader with a global distribution network and a long history of paying and increasing dividends.

name: Vanguard High Dividend Yield ETF
description: VYM provides broad exposure to high dividend yielding U.S. companies, offering diversification across industries with an income tilt.

name: JPMorgan Equity Premium Income ETF
description: JEPI seeks to deliver monthly income by combining equity exposure with covered call strategies on large-cap U.S. stocks.
